summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting service of a trial subpoena on a court reporter named Sandra, who recorded a deposition involving an individual referred to as 'MI'. The email includes an attachment of the subpoena and a deposition transcript for reference.

persons.name: Sandra
persons.context: The court reporter for a deposition who is being subpoenaed for trial, potentially to admit prior statements about 'MI' contacting her about work.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, working in the Southern District of New York, who is coordinating the service of a trial subpoena and witness management for an upcoming trial.

connections.description: MI allegedly called Sandra about work, as referenced in a prior deposition transcript that Sandra recorded.
The prosecutor is issuing a trial subpoena to Sandra to secure her testimony as a witness.

events.title: Issuance of Trial Subpoena
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney requests service of a trial subpoena on court reporter Sandra to testify about prior statements regarding 'MI'.

events.title: Prior Deposition
events.description: A deposition was previously recorded by court reporter Sandra, which contains statements about 'MI' contacting her about work.

keyFacts: A trial subpoena was issued for court reporter Sandra to testify about prior statements involving 'MI'.
The subpoena is related to a deposition Sandra recorded, where 'MI' allegedly called her about work.
The correspondence indicates active trial preparation by the U.S. Attorney's Office in the Southern District of New York.
The document references an attached deposition transcript that may contain relevant evidence about 'MI's activities.
